summary: This little devil has the power to resurrect the dead, but it can't control them... Still working on that!
descriptionHtml:
This little devil has the power to resurrect the dead, but it can't control them... Still working on that! Now I now what are you going to say; "this is useless, I want to control the dead!" I know but this is my first mod, so cut me some slack ok? :)

You can find it in Hjerim, on the Necromantic Altar (that stone table with a lot of bones on it).
author: Gardaland
